WorkItem.ClosedComment: According to the thread at http://www.telerik.com/community/forums/silverlight/gridview/gridview-selecteditem-update-issue.aspx the issue was not caused by EventToCommand and is solved now.
WorkItem.Description:
You library is very helpful! Thanks!
